item.title: Extract Information From PDFs
item.description: tl;dr Optical Character Recognition (OCR) can be used to extract text information from PDF files. In this blog post, I am using the tesseract framework to extract the weekly menu of a takeaway store. What am I using OCR for? For a side project, I am creating a lunch web app. The goal is to provide an overview of all lunch menus in the proximity. I am setting up the web app for my home city to kick off the project.
